value.title: Track global air quality with Azure Maps
value.excerpt: This module shows how you can track global air quality using the Azure Maps Web SDK and pollution data from a third-party air quality API.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Security Center for IoT
value.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft Azure Security Center’s new IoT capabilities. Azure is now the first major public cloud with end-to-end security for IoT with enhancements to three key services.
